meanings.definition: The study or creation of new words or expressions.
meanings.sent1: Her neology research focuses on inventing fun words for children's books.
meanings.sent2: The author's neology added a fresh and exciting twist to the story.
meanings.sent3: In her neology class, they made up silly words that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His neology was like a colorful paint palette, adding vibrancy to the language.
meanings.sent5: The neology workshop sparked her creativity and love for language.

meanings.definition: The use of new words or expressions.
meanings.sent1: The neology in the poem made it stand out from traditional works.
meanings.sent2: His neology in the speech captured the attention of the audience.
meanings.sent3: The neology in the advertisement made the product seem more appealing.
meanings.sent4: Her neology was a breath of fresh air in the world of literature.
meanings.sent5: The neology in the song lyrics painted a vivid picture in the listener's mind.
